## Cluster Analysis

这个是reducing observations，而不像PCA是那种reducing varibles.

distance matrix

core: minimize distances between oversvations in the same group

e.g., K-mean Clusters
Lloyd's algorithm
问题：
- 需要选K groups
- 需要选择不同的weights


e.g., Hierarchical clustering (例如生物的分类？)
Dendrogram (树状图)
Single linkage agglomerative clustering


e.g.,
定义不同的地方，问chatgpt不同的responses
